class_notes:
(Same as MATH 425 1) 
Seating is extremely limited Permission codes will be sent out during Add/Drop/Swap over the summer. For enrollment in ECON 425, please contact ECON (econungrad@emory.edu). For enrollment in Math 425, please contact Taylr Tuggle (tatuggl@emory.edu) in Math with questions.
course_description: Introduction to the use of calculus in economic analysis; comparative static problem and optimization theory; consideration of the mathematical techniques used in game theory.
prerequisites: (MATH 211 or MATH_OX 211 or MATH 276) and (ECON 201 or ECON_OX 201) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - N301
